coordinate_spec.rb:
require_relative 'coordinate'

describe Coordinate do
  it "calculates the distance from itself" do
    a = Coordinate.new(0, 0)
    expect(a.distance_from(a)).to eq(0)
  end

  it "calculates the distance from another coordinate along x axis" do
    a = Coordinate.new(0, 0)
    b = Coordinate.new(600, 0)
    expect(a.distance_from(b)).to eq(600)
  end

  it "calculates the distance from another coordinate" do
    a = Coordinate.new(0, 0)
    b = Coordinate.new(300, 400)
    expect(a.distance_from(b)).to eq(500)
  end
end
hear_shout.feature:
Feature: Hear Shout

  Shouts have a range of approximately 1000m

  Scenario: In range shout is heard
    Given Lucy is at 0, 0
    And Sean is at 0, 900
    When Sean shouts
    Then Lucy should hear Sean

  Scenario: Out of range shout is not heard
    Given Lucy is at 0, 0
    And Sean is at 800, 800
    When Sean shouts
    Then Lucy should not hear any shouts

  Scenario: Multiple shouters
    Given Lucy is at 0, 0
    And Sean is at 0, 500
    And Oscar is at 1100, 0
    When Sean shouts
    And Oscar shouts
    Then Lucy should not hear Oscar
    But Lucy should hear Sean
    
  Scenario: Shouters should not hear thier own shouts
    Given Sean is at 0, 0
    When Sean shouts
    Then Sean should not hear Sean
shout_steps.rb:
require_relative 'shouty'

ARBITRARY_MESSAGE = "Hello, world"

Before do
  @shouty = Shouty.new
end

Given('{word} is at {int}, {int}') do |listener, x, y|
  @shouty.set_location(listener, Coordinate.new(x, y))
end

When('{word} shouts') do |listener|
  @shouty.shout(listener, ARBITRARY_MESSAGE)
end

Then('{word} should hear Sean') do | listener |
  expect(@shouty.shouts_heard_by(listener).size).to eq(1)
end

Then('{word} should not hear any shouts') do | listener |
  expect(@shouty.shouts_heard_by(listener).size).to eq(0)
end

Then("{word} should not hear {word}") do | listener, shouter |
  expect(@shouty.shouts_heard_by(listener)).not_to include(shouter)
end

require_relative 'shouty'

describe Shouty do
  
  let (:shouty) { Shouty.new }
  
  describe '#initialize' do
    
    it 'can be created' do
      shouty = Shouty.new 
    end

  end
  
  describe '.shouts_heard_by' do
    let(:listener_location) do 
      location = double
      allow(location).to receive(:distance_from).and_return(100)
    end
  
    it 'does not hear shouts from self' do
      shouty.set_location('A Person', listener_location)
      shouty.shout('A Person', 'A Message')
      expect(shouty.shouts_heard_by('A Person')).to_be empty
    end 
  end
  
end
